name: The Mountain of Heroes
description:
H.E.R.O. project v2 below
- This time, I tryied to make my platform game inspired in H.E.R.O. all handmade using MSX color pallete, but soon I realized that it would take forever to finish... the only thing that reminds H.E.R.O. is the miner, but even he is sleeping :) 

H.E.R.O. project v1 below
- First time I tryied to use tileset :(  ... middle dark lines and rounded borders made tileset a nightmare...
